reviewtext: I'm listening with my new HD600 + Apogee Duet headphone amp, and it's amazing. If you try using these nice cans to directly plug into your macbook pro or ipod, you're really wasting your money. I also have Etymotic ER-4P's and they sound nearly identical without microphone amp. With an amp, it really sets it apart, especially if you're going to pay almost $400.
summary: Great headphones, need amp or else don't get it!
